item.title: Web developer - new startup (social news) (San Francisco)
item.description:
Overview
We are a startup developing an online platform for the delivery of highly personalized real-time news and information. News, including magazines and technical journals, should be provided by people to people. Experts should emerge independently of business interests and self-appointed editorial boards. News is undergoing a deep industry-wide transformation. Now there is a window of opportunity to redefine the way it is found and transmitted. We are building a new internet-based ecosystem that will make this possible for millions of users interacting in real time. We are seeking talented developers who believe in this mission.

Our Team
We are a small, experienced team based in San Francisco and Oakland. We are led by the former Founder and CEO of a successful venture-backed software company.

Responsibilities
Join our development team. Preferably, we are seeking developers who either (1) have extensive experience in configuration, scaling and deployment of databases and servers or (2) have experience in designing and developing dynamic web applications, (3) have experience in web-based user interface design and coding or (4) experience building or integrating web-based advertising systems. We will consider part-time involvement.

Skills
Languages such as: Python, C/C++, Java, Lisp.
Web technologies and frameworks such as: Django, Rails, Pylons, ClearSilver, Pinax, Lighttpd, Apache, CSS/HTML/AJAX, Dojo/Scriptaculous/JQuery
Scaling: virtualization, load balancing, message queuing, RDBMSes (Postgres or MySQL), replication
Experience developing and using web-based APIs.
Algorithms: natural language processing, clustering, agent-based programming

There are no specific educational or experience requirements; so long as you are talented and passionate about building a new company.

Compensation
We are currently self-funded, so can offer you only an equity award at this time. Our goal, however, is to close an investment round in the next 6 months.
item.dc:title: Web developer - new startup (social news) (San Francisco)
